content: what is  send hContact microformat to google contacts (chrome extension)?

The "send hContact microformat to Google Contacts" Chrome extension is a tool that allows you to extract contact information from web pages that use the hContact microformat and add it directly to your Google Contacts. 

The hContact microformat is a standardized way of marking up contact information in HTML code. It typically includes the person's name, address, phone number, email address, and other details in a structured format that is easily parseable by software.

With the Chrome extension installed, you can navigate to a web page that has a hContact markup and click on the extension icon. It will analyze the page for hContact data and provide you with a preview of the extracted contact information. You can then choose to add this information to your Google Contacts by clicking on the "Add to Google Contacts" button.

This tool can save you time and effort in manually copying contact details from web pages and entering them into your Google Contacts. It is useful for professionals who often need to gather contact information from various websites or individuals who want to quickly save contact information they come across online.
